name: clanpress
description: ClanPress is full featured clan management plugin.

scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- dist/js/teamspeak-viewer.js > dist/js/teamspeak-viewer.min.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -- dist/js/upload-field.js > dist/js/upload-field.min.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.compile: npm run compile:js && npm run compile:css && npm run minify

author: Christian Hanne <support@aureola.codes
